𑁍 LOTUS !

Prakit written in Brahmi script 3rd century BCE to the 8th century CE.

Strangely there seams to be a second alphabet

Reduced alphabet: 𑀐 𓂝𓂞𓂢 AI 𑀅 ЯA 𑀏 E

𑀃 JIHVAMULIYA 𑀄 UPADHMANIYA

𑀆 AA 𑀒 AU 𑀐 AI 𑀩 BA 𑀧 PA 𑀤 DA 𑀥 DHA 𑀇 I 𑀈 II 𑀋 R 𑀌 RR 𑀍 L 𑀎 LL 𑀏 E 𑀑 O 𑀓 KA 𑀔 KHA 𑀕 GA 𑀖 GHA 𑀗 NGA 𑀘 CA 𑀙 CHA Q 𑀚 JA 𑀛 JHA 𑀜 NYA 𑀝 TTA 𑀞 TTHA 𑀟 DDA 𑀠 DDHA 𑀡 NNA 𑀢 TA 𑀉 U 𑀊 UU 𑀣 THA 𑀦 NA 𑀫 MA 𑀨 PHA 𑀪 BHA 𑀬 YA 𑀭 RA 𑀮 LA 𑀯 VA 𑀰 SHA 𑀱 SSA 𑀲 SA 𑀳 HA 𑀴 LLA 𑀵 LLLA 𑀶 RRA 𑀷 NNNA 𑀸 AA 𑀹 AA 𑀺 I 𑀻 II 𑀼 U 𑀽 UU 𑀾 R 𑀿 RR 𑁀 L 𑁁 LL 𑁂 E 𑁃 AI 𑁄 O 𑁅 AU 𑁆 VIRAMA 𑁇 DANDA 𑁈 DOUBLE DANDA 𑁉 DOT 𑁊 DOUBLE DOT 𑁋 LINE 𑁌 CRESCENT BAR 𑁍 LOTUS !
